title: In Flames [2008 EP 7-Track Pack]
description:
4 new tracks from In Flames&#039; new 2008 EP entitled "The Mirror&#039;s Truth;" as well as 2 demos and a new song.  This torrent includes:


-- "The Mirrors Truth [EP]" - A new EP released March 5 with the tracks "The Mirror&#039;s Truth," "Eraser," "Tilt," and a new version of "Abnegation".

-- "Disconnected" - A prereleased track from In Flames&#039; new CD. This is the uncut Radio Rip, re-equalized and complete with the portion missing on other leaked versions.

-- "Abnegation" - A Myspace Rip of the "hard demo", as well as the demo version included on "Viva La Bands Vol. 2"


   EP: 192 KBPS CBR MP3. Released by P2P, edited by me due to annoying silence gaps.
OTHER: 192 KBPS VBR [or higher] MP3.
